name: Order Cancellation Requests
description: Customer queries about canceling their orders.

name: Order Modification Requests
description: Customer inquiries about modifying their existing orders, such as adding, removing, or changing items.

name: Other Requests
description: Miscellaneous customer support queries that do not fit into the categories above, such as questions about order status, shipping, or returns.

name: Editing Orders
description: [Customers are seeking assistance in editing their orders, including adding, removing, or swapping items.]

name: Correcting Purchases
description: [Customers need help correcting mistakes in their purchases, such as removing or changing items.]

name: Updating Orders
description: [Customers want to know how to update their orders, often due to changes in their delivery address.]

name: Deleting Items from Orders
description: [Customers are trying to delete one or more items from their orders and need assistance doing so.]

name: Adding Items to Orders
description: [Customers want to add items to their existing orders and are looking for guidance on how to do this.]

name: Swapping Items in Orders
description: [Customers want to swap one item for another in their order and need help completing this process.]

name: General Questions about Changes to Orders
description: [Customers have general questions about making changes to their orders, such as whether it's possible or how to go about it.]

name: Modifying Purchases
description: [Customers need help modifying their purchases, which can include editing, updating, or correcting them.]

name: Other Issues
description: [Customers have miscellaneous issues not covered by the other clusters, such as problems with the website or issues with their account.]

name: Modifying Shipping Address
description: [Customers are seeking help in changing their shipping address.]

name: Viewing Invoices
description: [Customers are trying to locate and view their invoices.]

name: Locating Specific Invoices
description: [Customers are asking for help in finding a specific invoice, usually identified by an invoice number.]

name: Finding Bills from a Person or Company
description: [Customers want assistance in locating bills associated with a particular person or company.]

name: Checking Invoices or Bills
description: [Customers are seeking to view their invoices or bills, often without specifying a particular invoice or bill.]

name: Seeing Payment Options
description: [Customers want to know what payment methods are accepted or available.]

name: Other Inquires
description: [This cluster includes all other customer inquiries that do not fit into the above categories, such as questions about payment methods or other account-related issues.]

name: Payment Method Inquiries
description: [Customers are asking how to view or check the available payment methods.]

name: Refund Policy Inquiries
description: [Customers are asking about the refund policy, including how long refunds take and in what cases refunds are allowed.]

name: Refund Policy Inquiry
description: The customer is asking for information about the company's refund policy or how to request a refund.

name: Consumer Claim / Complaint
description: The customer wants to file a claim or complaint against the company for unsatisfactory service or product.

name: Customer Support Contact Information
description: The customer is looking for ways to contact customer support, such as phone numbers, email addresses, or hours of availability.

name: Customer Service Hours Inquiry
description: Questions related to the hours when customer service is available.

name: Contacting Customer Support
description: Questions about how to get in touch with customer support or assistance in doing so.

name: Talking to a Live Agent
description: Questions about speaking with a live agent or human operator.

name: Free Customer Support Number
description: Questions about the availability of a free customer support phone number.

name: Email Address for Customer Support
description: Questions about the email address for customer support.

name: Toll-Free Number
description: Questions about the availability of a toll-free number for customer support.

name: Speaking with Customer Service
description: Questions about how to speak with customer service or assistance in doing so.

name: Checking Customer Service Hours
description: Questions about how to check the hours when customer service is available.

name: Contacting Customer Assistance
description: Questions about how to get in touch with customer assistance or assistance in doing so.

name: Getting in Touch with Customer Support
description: Questions about how to get in touch with customer support or assistance in doing so.

name: Assistance Speaking with Customer Service
description: Questions about assistance in speaking with customer service.

name: Customer Service Phone Number
description: Questions about the phone number for customer service.

name: Assistance Calling Customer Support
description: Questions about assistance in calling customer support.

name: Checking Customer Assistance Hours
description: Questions about how to check the hours when customer assistance is available.

name: Assistance Contacting Customer Service
description: Questions about assistance in contacting customer service.

name: Customer Support Working Hours
description: Questions about the working hours of customer support.

name: Assistance Seeing Customer Support Hours
description: Questions about assistance in seeing the hours when customer support is available.

name: Checking Customer Service Availability
description: Questions about how to check the availability of customer service.

name: Assistance Checking Customer Support Hours
description: Questions about assistance in checking the hours when customer support is available.

name: Speaking with a Human Agent
description: [Customers are seeking help to communicate with a human agent or operator.]

name: Creating or Opening Accounts
description: [Customers need assistance in creating or opening various types of accounts.]

name: Technical Difficulties
description: [Customers are experiencing technical issues and need help resolving them.]

name: Account Creation Inquiries
description: [Customers are asking about how to create new accounts.]

name: Account Deletion Inquiries
description: [Customers are asking about how to delete or close their accounts.]

name: Delivery Inquiries
description: [Customers are asking about delivery options and whether they can order from specific locations.]

name: Shipping Method Inquiries
description: Questions pertaining to the available shipping methods and how to check them.

name: Delivery Country Inquiries
description: Questions asking if orders can be placed from specific countries.

name: Delivery City Inquiries
description: Questions asking if orders can be placed from specific cities.

name: Order Placement Inquiries
description: Questions asking about the possibility of placing an order from a specific location.

name: General Shipping Inquiries
description: Questions related to shipping but not specifically about methods, delivery locations, or order placement.

name: Delivery Time Inquiries
description: Questions asking about the estimated delivery time or shipping period.

name: Shipping Time Inquiries
description: Customers are asking for help in checking when their parcels or items will arrive.

name: Account Modification Requests
description: Customers are requesting assistance with changing or updating details on their accounts.

name: Account Information Modification
description: [Customers are seeking assistance in changing their account details.]

name: Billing Inquiry
description: [Customers are asking for help with downloading or mailing their bills.]

name: Refund Request
description: [Customers are inquiring about getting a refund for a purchase.]

name: Requesting Refunds/Rebates/Reimbursements
description: The customer is unsure how to initiate the process of receiving a refund, rebate, or reimbursement for a purchase.

name: Canceling/Unsubscribing from Newsletters
description: The customer needs help with canceling their subscription or unsubscribing from a company newsletter.

name: Subscribing to Newsletters
description: The customer is trying to sign up for a company newsletter but needs assistance with the process.

name: Checking Newsletter Subscription Status
description: The customer wants to know the status of their newsletter subscription or how to check it.

name: Newsletter Subscription Inquiries
description: Questions about subscribing to or unsubscribing from the company newsletter.

name: Payment Issues
description: Questions about problems with making payments or reporting payment errors.

name: Ordering Assistance
description: Questions about how to order products from the company.

name: Purchasing Process Questions
description: [Customers are asking for help on how to buy products.]

name: Ordering Process Questions
description: [Customers need assistance with placing orders.]

name: Product Acquisition Questions
description: [Customers are unsure about how to acquire or earn products.]

name: Shopping Process Questions
description: [Customers are asking for help with the shopping process in general.]

name: Account Access Questions
description: [Customers need help with retrieving or resetting their account access keys, passwords, or PINs.]

name: Location Questions
description: [Customers are asking where to perform various actions, such as buying, ordering, or earning products.]

name: Other Questions
description: [Customers have miscellaneous questions that don't fit into the other categories.]

name: Forgotten User PIN/Password Recovery
description: [Customers are unable to remember their PIN or password and seek assistance in recovering or resetting it.]

name: Sign-up Issues
description: [Customers are experiencing problems during the sign-up process and need help resolving issues related to account creation.]

name: Sign-up Error Reporting
description: Users are having trouble signing up and want to know how to report or notify of these issues.

name: Leaving Feedback or Reviews
description: Users need help leaving feedback, writing reviews, or submitting opinions about products, services, or the company in general.

name: Shipping Address Setup
description: Users are experiencing issues setting up or entering their shipping addresses and need assistance resolving these problems.

name: Delivery Address Setup Issues
description: [Customers are having trouble setting up or entering a new delivery address.]

name: Submitting Delivery Address Problems
description: [Customers need help submitting their delivery address or are encountering errors while doing so.]

name: Shipping Address Setup Issues
description: [Customers are facing difficulties setting up or entering a new shipping address.]

name: Secondary Delivery/Shipping Address Setup Issues
description: [Customers need assistance setting up a secondary delivery or shipping address.]

name: Validation Issues with Delivery/Shipping Address
description: [Customers are encountering issues with their delivery or shipping address being invalid.]

name: Switching Account Types
description: [Customers need help changing or switching to different account types, such as freemium, gold, platinum, or standard.]

name: Account Type Change Inquiries
description: Customers are asking how to change their account type or switch to a different account.

name: Account Usage Questions
description: Users are seeking help on using specific features of their current account type.

name: Account Profile Assistance
description: Customers need assistance with managing their account profiles, such as using or changing profiles.

name: Order Status Inquiries
description: Users are asking about the status of their orders, including estimated delivery times.

name: Refund Inquiries
description: [Customers are inquiring about the status of their refunds, often specifying the amount expected.]

name: General Support Requests
description: [Customers are asking for assistance with various issues, such as tracking orders or reimbursements, but without specifying the exact problem.]
